text: Arau sihamtara ocarata amara suspasta ayatasamuha tilarata karaa ha’le tumi kaphirasakalara mukhamandalata asantusta bhara dekhibalai paba. Yisakale amara ayatasamuha sihamtara ocarata tilarata karae sihamte te'omlokaka akramana karaibalai udyata haya. Koraa, ‘ma'i tomalokaka iyatakaiyo nikrsta bastura sambada dimane?--- Seya ha’la ju'i. Yisakale kupharai karaiche allahe sihamtaka iyara pratisrauti diche. E'ito kimana ye nikrsta pratyarartanasthala!’
